Albertus Viljoen Chenin Blanc Vertical Tasting Experience

Embark on a vertical wine tasting journey, and compare three different vintages of the same wine – our much-awarded Alvi’s Drift Albertus Viljoen Chenin Blanc.

Choose between the Chenin Blanc Gold Vintage Taste & Compare Box (three wines in a reusable, artisan-crafted wooden box) or the great-value Chenin Blanc Gold Vintage Taste & Share Box (six wines in a recyclable box).
